title: Challenging Smite Bug
body:
I was wondering if anyone else is having an issue with challenging smites true damage buff doing damage to Tryndamere while he is on 1 hp in undying rage (eg. you can kill him while he has undying rage on) .

Its happened on a few games thought Riot would like to check it out if they are not already aware.

Cheers

replies.body: YES I DIED TO JUNGLER WITH THAT AND I WAS WONDERING WTFG?
